Documentation

This is the base documentation site of the Test-Editor project. You can find out more info about creating test-specifications, test-cases, the usage of the Test-Editor, customizing your test-drivers for the specific application under test, as well as quick local installation guide at hub.docker.com/testeditor/web

You can find the source code for Test-Editor Web at GitHub: test-editor / test-editor-web
